en.pressContinue: Press the next button to continue.
en.tut_00_00: Wow, I can't believe it's my first day at the Intergalactic Golf Course. I'm gonna make you proud, Mom!
en.tut_00_01: Before you make your mom proud, how about you get back to work!  You're a good kid, but so unfocused...
en.tut_00_02: Listen, I know these golfers.  They're bad, real bad.  But we can make 'em good, with da power of GRAVITY!
en.tut_00_03: Gravity? That thing that pulls other objects toward their center of mass?
en.tut_00_04: "Thing"!? Gravity is a force! It's what is being measured when you check your weight at home!
en.tut_01_00: Did you see that, Manny!? I did it!
en.tut_01_01: Don't let your head get too big, you'll start pulling in all the golf balls!
en.tut_01_02: Who am I kiddin', you did good, kid. You've got the call of the caddie.
en.tut_01_03: But here comes the next hole.  Everything's got mass here, so everything's attracting everything else.
en.tut_01_04: Just like the moon going around the Earth, or an asteroid landing in the ocean, ...
en.tut_01_05: ... that golf ball is either going to be pulled into orbit, or have a crash landing with the other masses.
en.tut_01_07: KT, you've gotta shift those objects, and make that golfer make the best shot he's ever seen!
en.tut_01_08: ... that way, we'll get some good tips to use at the gift shop!
en.tut_00_05: Here, try moving this planet until the gravitational forces get the golfer's arc to reach the hole. Fore!
en.tut_05_01: You got this, just channel the caddie I know is in your bones!
en.tut_05_02: Move the lower mass planets away from the largest one, and the ball can slingshot!
en.title: Gravity Golf

jp.readyToPlay: あなたは遊ぶ準備ができていますか？
jp.pressContinue: 続行するには '次へ'ボタンを押してください。
